item.title: Benefits of studying in a reading room
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Do you have trouble studying in your home environment? Perhaps studying in the reading room is more effective than studying at home or vice versa. Studying in a reading room offers many benefits especially if you have trouble focusing at your home. The reading room is a quiet place in an academic setting that allows […]
item.content:encoded:
Do you have trouble studying in your home environment? Perhaps studying in the reading room is more effective than studying at home or vice versa. Studying in a reading room offers many benefits especially if you have trouble focusing at your home. The reading room is a quiet place in an academic setting that allows you to keep your mind focused.

Reading room is an academically centered environment and which will keep your brain focused on your studies. It’s a great place to meet other students and form a study group. There is nothing within the sight- or any other senses- to distract you from studying.

Here at Central Readers Club, you will get all kinds of benefits including canteen services. So make sure to visit the central readers club to expand your knowledge and get a chance to socialize with fellow members with the utmost facilities and, of course, achieve your academic need.

At the end, Wherever you choose to study, make sure you are getting the most out of your session. 

Happy Studying!

item.title: Why you shouldn’t miss Surgery Pearls 2020?
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Surgery Pearls is an event organized by House of Health organization. This event was organized to update as well as revise all the existing knowledge in surgery aimed specialties among the rising surgeons. After the success of Surgery Pearls 2018, the organization didn’t wait to organize Surgery Pearls 2019. Surgery Pearls 2018 was an academic […]
item.content:encoded:
Surgery Pearls is an event organized by House of Health organization. This event was organized to update as well as revise all the existing knowledge in surgery aimed specialties among the rising surgeons. After the success of Surgery Pearls 2018, the organization didn’t wait to organize Surgery Pearls 2019.

Surgery Pearls 2018 was an academic feast for all the surgery residents. Lectures, panel discussions, case presentation and intermedial college quiz competition was conducted. An opportunity for MS surgery residents to revise many important topics in surgery. The program was conducted for 3 days into different sessions. 

In both surgery pearls 2018 and 2019 different topics on medical surgery were discussed like Cryptorchidism, Anorectal malformations, short bowel syndrome, Ergonomics in Laparoscopy, Obstructive Jaundice, Inuinoscrotal swelling, Gastrointestinal anastomosis, Abdominal Lump, Thyroid nodule with clinical case discussion and video/audio presentation. All the attendees of the event were given breakfast, lunch and dinner facilities. 

For Surgery Pearls 2020, the organization has started planning to make it more big and grand with enough case discussion and presentation happened in a year. So for all the interested medical attendees this coming event is going to be more productive and knowledgeable for them so it would be a great loss missing the chance to learn important matters and gaining more experience. Do not miss Surgery Pearls 2020 !!

item.title: More Than a Reading Room
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Central Readers Club aims to become not just a reading room but more than a reading room. This reading club provides all the facilities needed for the readers. Central readers club is located at the heart of the city still away from the hassle. It is powered by the House of health. A reading club […]
item.content:encoded:
Central Readers Club aims to become not just a reading room but more than a reading room. This reading club provides all the facilities needed for the readers. Central readers club is located at the heart of the city still away from the hassle. It is powered by the House of health.

A reading club must provide the aura for the readers and peaceful environment is a must.

House of health(Central Readers Club) provides optimum facilities like a healthy food system, a peaceful environment for more concentration, locker systems for easiness. 

Central reader’s clubs have ample facilities to relax you all when you are bored. Central readers even provide internet facilities for all the readers coming in. Central Readers Club can provide guidance for all the medical studying students by our professional team of doctors and surgeons. 

Basically, the Central Readers Club can be the birth of ideas, a place where history comes to life. With all the facilities around there can be no hindrance in giving your best shot in the world of readers and writers.
